scripts.watch:sass: watch 'npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer' public/assets/styles/ resources/styles/
scripts.browserify: browserify public/assets/scripts/common.ts --debug -t babelify -p [tsify --noImplicitAny --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata] | exorcist dist/assets/scripts/bundle.js.map > dist/assets/scripts/bundle.js -d
scripts.watch:browserify: watch 'npm run browserify' public/assets/scripts/ resources/scripts resources/types
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run transport
scripts.build: npm run prepare && (npm run ejs & (npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer) & npm run browserify & npm run transport)
scripts.build:production: npm run build && (npm run uglifycss & npm run uglifyjs)
scripts.watch: npm run prepare && (npm run watch:ejs & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:browserify & npm run watch:transport)
scripts.start: npm run webserver & npm run watch
